title: Video: Stonefox – All I Want
body:
Melbourne trio **Stonefox** cemented their position as one of the most exciting new acts of the year with their stunning debut track _All I Want_, which saw them rocket up the Hype Machine, as well as picking up plaudits all across the web.

Still only in their teens, the three piece (Tim Carroll, Jenna Russo, Will O’Gorman) have no doubt been attracting some serious industry interest, and play their single launch at Revolver Bandroom this coming Saturday 31 May. To mark the occasion, they’ve released sombre, black and white visuals to go alongside All I Want, check them out below.
